title: Boucher House: Book 2
description: With Dr. Boucher away things are finally looking up.The majority of the staff still despise us, but without his torturous ways I can finally breathe for the first time since I came here.With new arrivals and unexpected allies, Iâ€™m about to discover just how deep the darkness goes in this place.I've always been a firm believer that nothing good ever lasts in this place, hopefully that doesn't extend to my new relationships that bloomed in this very place of evil.This is a why choose romance, where the fmc will have more than one love interest without having to choose. This is a dark, forced proximity romance. It touches on sensitive matters and scenes that may trigger some people.
author: B.C. Morgan
